sn38.6:4.1: “Reverend Sāriputta, they speak of this thing called ‘gaining ultimate self-confidence’.
sn38.6:4.2: At what point do you gain ultimate self-confidence?”
sn38.6:4.3: “When a mendicant is freed without grasping after truly understanding the six fields of contact’s origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape, at that point they’ve gained ultimate self-confidence.”
sn38.6:4.4: “But, reverend, is there a path and a practice for realizing this ultimate self-confidence?”
